Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry

Class TelemetryConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry.TelemetryConfig
  • public class TelemetryConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Top-level telemetry configuration for Gumdrop. Configured via dependency injection in the gumdroprc file.

    The presence of a TelemetryConfig (non-null) on a connector indicates that telemetry is enabled. There is no separate "enabled" flag.

    Example configuration: 

     <component id="telemetry" class="org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry.TelemetryConfig">
     <property name="service-name">my-service</property>
     <property name="service-version">1.0.0</property>
     <property name="endpoint">http://localhost:4318</property>
 </component>
    Author:
    Chris Burdess

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      TelemetryConfig()
      Creates a new telemetry configuration with default values.

      • isTracesEnabled

        public boolean isTracesEnabled()
        Returns true if trace collection is enabled. Traces are enabled by default when TelemetryConfig is present.

        public void setTracesEnabled​(boolean tracesEnabled)
        Enables or disables trace collection.
        Parameters:
        tracesEnabled - true to enable traces

        public void setEndpoint​(java.lang.String endpoint)

        Parameters:
        endpoint - the endpoint URL (e.g., "http://localhost:4318")

      • getTruststoreFile

        public java.lang.String getTruststoreFile()
        Returns the truststore file path for HTTPS endpoints.

        When connecting to HTTPS OTLP endpoints, this truststore is used to verify the server's certificate. If not set, the JVM's default truststore is used.

      • setTruststoreFile

        public void setTruststoreFile​(java.lang.String truststoreFile)
        Sets the truststore file path for HTTPS endpoints.
        Parameters:
        truststoreFile - the path to the truststore file

      • getTruststorePass

        public java.lang.String getTruststorePass()
        Returns the truststore password.

      • setTruststorePass

        public void setTruststorePass​(java.lang.String truststorePass)
        Sets the truststore password.
        Parameters:
        truststorePass - the truststore password

        Returns the truststore format.

      • setTruststoreFormat

        public void setTruststoreFormat​(java.lang.String truststoreFormat)
        Sets the truststore format.
        Parameters:
        truststoreFormat - the format (default: PKCS12)

        Parameters:

      • init

        public void init()
        Initializes the telemetry configuration. This method is called automatically by the ComponentRegistry after all properties have been set via the gumdroprc configuration file.

        If any OTLP endpoints are configured (tracesEndpoint, logsEndpoint, or metricsEndpoint), an OTLPExporter is automatically created and started.

      • getExporter

        public TelemetryExporter getExporter()
        Returns the exporter instance.

      • setExporter

        public void setExporter​(TelemetryExporter exporter)
        Sets the exporter instance. Automatically registers a JVM shutdown hook to flush telemetry on exit.
        Parameters:
        exporter - the exporter

      • createTrace

        public Trace createTrace​(java.lang.String rootSpanName)
        Creates a new trace with this configuration.
        Parameters:
        rootSpanName - the name for the root span
        Returns:
        a new trace, or null if telemetry is disabled

      • createTrace

        public Trace createTrace​(java.lang.String rootSpanName,
                         SpanKind kind)
        Creates a new trace with this configuration.
        Parameters:
        rootSpanName - the name for the root span
        kind - the kind for the root span
        Returns:
        a new trace, or null if telemetry is disabled

      • createTraceFromTraceparent

        public Trace createTraceFromTraceparent​(java.lang.String traceparent,
                                        java.lang.String rootSpanName,
                                        SpanKind kind)
        Creates a trace continuing from a remote context.
        Parameters:
        traceparent - the W3C traceparent header value
        rootSpanName - the name for the local root span
        kind - the kind for the root span
        Returns:
        a new trace, or null if telemetry is disabled

      • getMeter

        public Meter getMeter​(java.lang.String name)
        Returns a Meter for the given instrumentation scope. If a Meter for this scope already exists, it is returned.
        Parameters:
        name - the instrumentation scope name (e.g., "org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http")
        Returns:
        the Meter, or a no-op meter if metrics are disabled

      • getMeter

        public Meter getMeter​(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String version)
        Returns a Meter for the given instrumentation scope. If a Meter for this scope already exists, it is returned.
        Parameters:
        name - the instrumentation scope name
        version - the instrumentation scope version
        Returns:
        the Meter, or a no-op meter if metrics are disabled

      • getMeter

        public Meter getMeter​(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String version,
                      java.lang.String schemaUrl)
        Returns a Meter for the given instrumentation scope. If a Meter for this scope already exists, it is returned.
        Parameters:
        name - the instrumentation scope name
        version - the instrumentation scope version
        schemaUrl - the schema URL
        Returns:
        the Meter

      • getMeters

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Meter> getMeters()
        Returns all registered meters.

      • registerShutdownHook

        public void registerShutdownHook()
        Registers a JVM shutdown hook to flush telemetry on exit. This ensures all pending telemetry data is exported before the JVM terminates. The hook is registered automatically when an exporter is set.

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Shuts down telemetry, flushing all pending data. This method blocks until the flush completes or times out.

      • isShuttingDown

        public boolean isShuttingDown()
        Returns true if telemetry is currently shutting down.
        Returns:
        true if shutdown has been initiated

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
